content.rendered:
Directed by Dhyan Sreenivasan

Written by Dhyan Sreenivasan

Cast Nivin Pauly (Dinesh). Nayanthara (Shoba). Aju Varghese (Sagar). Vineeth Sreenivasan (Suman). Basil Joseph (Brijesh). Mallika Sukumaran (Dinesh’s Mother) . Dhanya Balakrishna (Priya). Jude Anthany Joseph (Shinoj). Durga Krishna (Swathi). Maya Menon (Swathi’s Mother). Prajin Padmanabhan (Ravi). Renji Panicker (Swathi’s Father). Motta Rajendran (Rajendar). Sunder Ramu (Venkit). Gayathri Shan (Kala). Biju Sopanam (Satheesh). Sreenivasan (Shoba’s Father). Dhyan Sreenivasan (Singer – Kudukku Song (Cameo)). Nandhan Unni (Friend at the Bachelor Party)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Visakh Subramaniam. Aju Varghese

Production Funtastic Film. M Star Satellite Communication
